The reading assignment this week is McGonigle, "Ethical Applications of Informatics".

Read and understand the following sections. We will be discussing a case in class and you will be graded on your collective contributions to the discussion.

1. Ethical Dilemmas and Morals
1. Ethical Decision Making
1. Theoretical Approaches to Healthcare Ethics (especially Beauchamp & Childress' four guiding principles)
1. Applying Ethics to Informatics (including Box 5-1)
